GS39kamasutu:357_1: tataś ca krameṇa pūraṇam vegasyā^ity upapadyate / dhātu^kṣayāc ca

GS39kamasutu:369_0: 2.1.27 /.tatra^etat syād upāya^vailakṣaṇyavad eva hi kārya^vailakṣaṇyam api kasmān na syād iti / tac ca na / hetumad upāya^vailakṣaṇyam /
GS39kamasutu:369_1: tatra kartrādhārayor bhinna^lakṣaṇatvād ahetumat kārya^vailakṣaṇyam anyāyyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:372: pṛthak pṛthak svārtha^sādhakau punar imau tad ayuktam iti//(p.85)
GS39kamasutu:373_0: 2.1.29 /.tac ca na / yugapad aneka^artha^siddhir api dṛśyate / yathā meṣayor abhighāte kapitthayor bhede mallayor yuddha
GS39kamasutu:373_1: iti / na tatra kāraka^bheda iti ced iha^api na vastu^bheda iti / upāya^vailakṣaṇyaṃ tu sargād iti tad abhihitaṃ purastāt /
GS39kamasutu:376: 2.1.31/.sadṛśatvasya siddhatvāt, kāla^yoginy api bhāvato +api kālataḥ pramāṇavad eva nava

GS39kamasutu:378: saṃprayogo rataṃ rahaḥ śayanaṃ mohanaṃ surata^paryāyāḥ//(p.88)
GS39kamasutu:380: teṣāṃ vyatikare surata^saṃkhyā na śakyate kartum/ atibahutvāt//(p.88)

GS39kamasutu:385: 2.1.37b/.prāpnuvanty āśu tāḥ prītim ity ācāryā vyavasthitāḥ//(p.91)

GS39kamasutu:409: ṣa^āyita^aupariṣṭakānām aṣṭānām aṣṭadhā vikalpa^bhedād aṣṭāv aṣṭakāś catuḥṣaṣṭir iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.96)
GS39kamasutu:411: prahaṇana^viruta^puruṣopasṛpta^citrarata^ādīnām anyeṣām api vargāṇām iha praveśanāt prāyovādo +ayam/ yathā sapta^parṇo vṛkṣaḥ pañca^varṇo balir iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.96)

GS39kamasutu:419: 2.2.12/.tad eva kuḍya^saṃdaṃśena stambha^saṃdaṃśena vā sphuṭakam avapīḍayed iti pīḍitakam//(p.99)

GS39kamasutu:433: 2.2.23/.tatra^ūru^saṃdaṃśena^ekam ūrum ūrudvayaṃ vā sarva^prāṇaṃ pīḍayet ity ūru^upagūhanam//(p.102)

GS39kamasutu:454: 2.3.6/.rāga^vaśād deśa^pravṛtteś ca santi tāni tāni sthānāni, na tu sarva^jana^prayojyāni^iti
GS39kamasutu:455: 2.3.7/.tad yathā --- nimitakaṃ sphuritakaṃ ghaṭṭitakam iti trīṇi kanyā^cumbanāni//(p.106)

GS39kamasutu:460: 2.3.11/.samaṃ tiryag udbhrāntam avapīḍitakam iti caturvidham apare//(p.107)

GS39kamasutu:720: 2.8.8/.puruṣaḥ śayanasthāyā yoṣitas tad vacana^vyākṣipta^cittāyā iva nīvīṃ viśleṣayet/ tatra vivadamānāṃ kapola^cumbanena paryākulayet/
GS39kamasutu:726: 2.8.13/.svairiṇyāṃ yathā^sātmyaṃ yathā^yogaṃ ca/ alake cumbana^artham enāṃ nirdayam avalambet/ hanu^deśe ca^aṅguli^saṃpuṭena/

GS39kamasutu:734: 2.8.19/.tasyāḥ prāg^yantra^yogāt kareṇa saṃbādhaṃ gaja eva kṣobhayet/ ā
GS39kamasutu:736: 2.8.20/.upasṛptakaṃ manthanaṃ hulo +avamardanaṃ pīḍitakaṃ nirghāto varāha^ghāto vṛṣa^āghātaś caṭaka^vilasitaṃ saṃpuṭa iti puruṣopasṛptāni/
GS39kamasutu:743: 2.8.26/.sudūram utkṛṣya vegena svajaghanam avapātayed iti nirghātaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:746: 2.8.29/.sakṛn^miśritam aniṣkramayya dvistriś catur iti ghaṭṭayed iti
GS39kamasutu:750: 2.8.32/.puruṣāyite tu saṃdaṃśo bhramarakaḥ preṅkholitam ity adhikāni//(p.163)
GS39kamasutu:751: 2.8.33/.vāḍavena liṅgam avagṛhya niṣkarṣantyāḥ pīḍayantyā vā cira^avasthānaṃ saṃdaṃśaḥ//(p.163)
GS39kamasutu:754: 2.8.36/.jaghanam eva dolāyamānaṃ sarvato bhrāmayed iti preṅkholitakam//(p.164)
GS39kamasutu:762: 2.8.41ab/.na tv eva^rtau na prasūtāṃ na mṛgīṃ na ca garbhiṇīm(p.165)
GS39kamasutu:766: 2.9.2/.tatra strī^rūpiṇī strīyā veṣa^mālāpaṃ līlāṃ bhāvaṃ mṛdutvaṃ
GS39kamasutu:769: 2.9.4/.sā tato ratim ābhimānikīṃ vṛttiṃ ca lipset/
GS39kamasutu:777: 2.9.10/.kṛta^lakṣaṇena^apy upalabdha^vaikṛtena^api na codyata iti cet svayam (p.166) upakramet/
GS39kamasutu:780: 2.9.13/.nimitaṃ pārśvato daṣṭaṃ bahiḥsaṃdaṃśo +antaḥsaṃdaṃśaś cumbitakaṃ parimṛṣṭakam āmracūṣitakaṃ saṃgara iti//(p.167)
GS39kamasutu:782: 2.9.15/.itaraś ca pūrvasminn abhyupagate taduttaram eva^aparaṃ nirdiśet/
GS39kamasutu:784: 2.9.16/.kara^avalambitam oṣṭhayor upari vinyastam apavidhya mukhaṃ vidhunuyāt/ tan^nimitam//(p.168)
GS39kamasutu:785: 2.9.17/.hasteṇa^agram avacchādya pārśvato nirdaśanam oṣṭābhyām avapīḍya bhavatv etāvad iti sāntvayet/ tat^pārśvato daṣṭam//(p.168)
GS39kamasutu:788: 2.9.19/.tasminn eva^abhyarthanayā kiṃ cid adhikaṃ praveśayet/ sā^api
GS39kamasutu:789: ca^agram oṣṭhābhyāṃ niṣpīḍya niṣṭhīvet/ ity antaḥsaṃdaṃśaḥ//(p.169)
GS39kamasutu:791: 2.9.21/.tat kṛtvā jihvā^agreṇa sarvato ghaṭṭanam agre ca vyadhanam iti
GS39kamasutu:792: 2.9.22/.tathābhūtam eva rāgavaśād ardha^praviṣṭaṃ nirdayam avapīḍyāv apīḍya muñcet/ iti
GS39kamasutu:796: 2.9.26/.tad etat tu na kāryam/ samaya^virodhād asabhyatvāc ca/ punar api hy āsāṃ vadana^saṃsarge svayam eva^ārtiṃ prapadyeta/ ity ācāryāḥ//(p.170)
GS39kamasutu:798: 2.9.28/.tasmād yās tv aupariṣṭakam ācaranti na tābhiḥ saha saṃsṛjyante prācyāḥ//(p.171)
GS39kamasutu:799: 2.9.29/.veśyābhir eva na saṃsṛjyante āhicchatrikāḥ saṃsṛṣṭā api
GS39kamasutu:804: 2.9.33/.evaṃ hy āhuḥ --- ko hi yoṣitāṃ śīlaṃ śaucam ācāraṃ caritraṃ pratyayaṃ vacanaṃ vā śraddhātum arhati/ nisargād eva hi malina^dṛṣṭayo
GS39kamasutu:805: bhavanty etā na parityājyāḥ/ tasmād āsāṃ smṛtita eva śaucam anveṣṭavyam/
GS39kamasutu:806: evaṃ hy āhuḥ ---(p.172) vatsaḥ prasravaṇe medhyaḥ śvā mṛga^grahaṇe
GS39kamasutu:807: śuciḥ/(p.172) śakuniḥ phala^pāte tu strī^mukhaṃ rati^saṃgame//(p.172)
GS39kamasutu:809: ātmanaś ca vṛtti^pratyaya^anurūpaṃ pravarteta/ iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.173)
GS39kamasutu:815: 2.9.37ab/.puruṣāś ca tathā strīṣu karma^etat kila kurvate/(p.174)
GS39kamasutu:821: 2.9.40ab/.na tv etad brāhmaṇo vidvān mantrī vā rāja^dhūr^dharaḥ//(p.175)
GS39kamasutu:823: 2.9.41ab/.na śāstram asti^ity etāvat prayoge kāraṇaṃ bhavet/(p.175)
GS39kamasutu:826: 2.9.42cd/.kīrtitā iti tat kiṃ syād bhakṣaṇīyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:827: 2.9.43ab/.santy eva puruṣāḥ ke cit santi deśās tathā^vidhāḥ/(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:828: 2.9.43cd/.santi kālāś ca yeṣv ete yogā na syur nirarthakāḥ//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:829: 2.9.44ab/.tasmād deśaṃ ca kālaṃ ca prayogaṃ śāstram eva ca/(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:830: 2.9.44cd/.ātmānaṃ ca^api saṃprekṣya yogān yuñjīta vā na vā//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:832: 2.9.45cd/.kaḥ kadā kiṃ kutaḥ kuryād iti ko jñātum arhati//(p.176)
GS39kamasutu:836: kṛta^snāna^prasādhanāṃ yuktyā pītāṃ striyaṃ sāntvanaiḥ punaḥ pānena
GS39kamasutu:838: 2.10.2/.dakṣiṇataś ca^asyā upaveśanam/ keśa^haste vastra^ante nīvyām ity avalambanam/ ratyarthaṃ savyena bāhunā^anuddhataḥ pariṣvaṅgaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:842: 2.10.4/.sanṛttam anṛttaṃ vā gītaṃ vāditram/ kalāsu saṃkathāḥ/ punaḥ
GS39kamasutu:844: 2.10.5/.jāta^anurāgāyāṃ kusuma^anulepana^tāmbūla^(177) dānena ca śeṣa^jana^visṛṣṭiḥ/ vijane ca yathā^uktair āliṅgana^ādibhir enām
GS39kamasutu:845: uddharṣayet/ tato nīvī^viśleṣaṇa^ādi yathā^uktam upakrameta/ ity ayaṃ rata^ārambhaḥ//(p.178)
GS39kamasutu:846: 2.10.6/.rata^avasānikaṃ rāgam ativāhya^asaṃstutayor iva savrīḍayoḥ parasparam apaśyatoḥ pṛthak pṛthag ācāra^bhūmi^gamanam/ pratinivṛttya
GS39kamasutu:847: ca^āvrīḍāyamānayor ucita^deśa^upaviṣṭayos tāmbūla^grahaṇam acchīkṛtaṃ candanam anyad vā^anulepanaṃ tasyā gātre svayam eva niveśayet/
GS39kamasutu:848: 2.10.7/.savyena bāhunā ca^enāṃ parirabhya caṣaka^hastaḥ sāntvayan pāyayet/
GS39kamasutu:849: jala^anupānaṃ vā khaṇḍa^khādyakam anyad vā prakṛti^sātmya^yuktam ubhāv apy upayuñjīyātām/
GS39kamasutu:851: cūta^phalāni śuṣka^māṃsaṃ mātuluṅga^cukrakāṇi saśarkarāṇi ca yathā^deśa^sātmyaṃ ca/ tatra madhuram idaṃ mṛdu viśadam iti ca vidaśya vidaśya tat tad upāharet/
GS39kamasutu:853: tatra^anukūlābhiḥ kathābhir anuvarteta/ tad^aṅka^saṃlīnāyāś candramasaṃ paśyantyā nakṣatra^paṅkti^vyaktī^karaṇam/
GS39kamasutu:859: 2.10.13a/.ādye saṃdarśane jāte pūrvaṃ ye syur manorathāḥ/(p.181)
GS39kamasutu:862: 2.10.13d/.tais taiś ca bhāvaiḥ saṃyukto yūno rāgo vivardhate//(p.181)
GS39kamasutu:863: 2.10.14/.rāgavad āhāryarāgaṃ kṛtrimarāgaṃ vyavahitarāgaṃ poṭārataṃ khalaratam ayantritaratam iti rataviśeṣāḥ//(p.182)
GS39kamasutu:868: 2.10.18/.tatra cātuḥṣaṣṭikair yogaiḥ sātmya^anuviddhaiḥ saṃdhukṣya saṃdhukṣya rāgaṃ pravarteta/
GS39kamasutu:871: 2.10.21/.puruṣas tu hṛdaya^priyām anyāṃ manasi nidhāya vyavaharet/
GS39kamasutu:872: saṃprayogāt prabhṛti ratiṃ yāvat/ atas tad^vyavahitarāgam//(p.183)
GS39kamasutu:873: 2.10.22/.nyūnāyāṃ kumbha^dāsyāṃ paricārikāyāṃ vā yāvad arthaṃ saṃprayogas tat^poṭāratam//(p.184)
GS39kamasutu:874: 2.10.24/.tathā veśyāyā grāmīṇena saha yāvad arthaṃ khalaratam//(p.184)
GS39kamasutu:878: ālāpaṃ vā gotra^skhalitaṃ vā na marṣayet/ nāyaka^vyalīkaṃ ca//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:879: 2.10.28/.tatra subhṛśaḥ kalaho ruditam āyāsaḥ śiro^ruhāṇām avakṣodanaṃ prahaṇanam āsanāc chayanād vā mahyāṃ patanaṃ mālya^bhūṣaṇa^avamokṣo bhūmau śayyā ca//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:880: 2.10.29/.tatra yukta^rūpeṇa sāmnā pāda^patanena vā prasanna^manās tām anunayann upakramya śayanam ārohayet//(p.185)
GS39kamasutu:881: 2.10.30/.tasya ca vacanam uttareṇa yojayantī vivṛddha^krodhā sakaca^graham
GS39kamasutu:882: asya^āsyam unnamayya pādena bāhau śirosi vakṣasi pṛṣṭhe vā sakṛd dvis trir
GS39kamasutu:884: 2.10.31/.atikruddhā^api tu na dvāra^deśād bhūyo gacchet/ doṣavattvāt/ iti
GS39kamasutu:885: dattakaḥ/ tatra yuktito +anunīyamānā prasādam ākāṅkṣet/ prasannā^api tu sakaṣāyair eva vākyair enaṃ tudatī^iva prasanna^rati^kāṅkṣiṇī nāyakena
GS39kamasutu:889: tair eva^anunītā taiḥ saha^eva tad^bhavanam adhigacchet/ tatra ca vaset/
GS39kamasutu:906: putrāḥ saṃbandhaḥ pakṣavṛddhir anupaskṛtā ratiś ca//(p.190)
GS39kamasutu:908: nyūna^vayasaṃ ślāghya^ācāre dhanavati pakṣavati kule saṃbandhi^priye
GS39kamasutu:912: 3.1.3/.yāṃ gṛhītvā kṛtinam ātmānaṃ manyeta na ca samānair nindyeta tasyāṃ
GS39kamasutu:914: 3.1.4/.tasyā varaṇe mātā^pitarau saṃbandhinaś ca prayateran/ mitrāṇi ca gṛhīta^vākyāny
GS39kamasutu:915: 3.1.5/.tāny anyeṣāṃ varayitṝṇāṃ doṣān pratyakṣa^anāgamikāṃś ca śrāvayeyuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:916: kaulān pauruṣeyān abhiprāya^saṃvardhakāṃś ca nāyakaguṇān/ viśeṣataś ca kanyāmātur anukūlāṃs tadātva^āyatiyuktān darśayeyuḥ//(p.192)
GS39kamasutu:923: 3.1.11/.apraśasta^nāmadheyāṃ ca guptāṃ dattāṃ ghonāṃ pṛṣatām ṛṣabhāṃ
GS39kamasutu:924: vinatāṃ vikaṭāṃ vimuṇḍāṃ śuci^dūṣitāṃ sāṃkarikīṃ rākāṃ phalīnīṃ mitrāṃ svanujām varṣakarīṃ ca varjayet//(p.193)
GS39kamasutu:927: 3.1.13/.yasyāṃ manaś^cakṣuṣor nibandhas tasyām ṛddhiḥ/ na^itarām ādriyeta/
GS39kamasutu:929: 3.1.14/.tasmāt pradāna^samaye kanyām udāra^veṣāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ/ aparāhṇikaṃ ca nityaṃ prasādhitāyāḥ sakhībhiḥ saha krīḍā/ yajña^vivāha^ādiṣu
GS39kamasutu:935: 3.1.18/.snāna^ādiṣu niyujyamānā varayitāraḥ sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati^ity uktvā na tad^ahar^eva^abhyupagaccheyuḥ//(p.196)
GS39kamasutu:937: anyatamena vivāhena śāstrataḥ pariṇayet/ iti varaṇa^vidhānam//(p.196)
GS39kamasutu:948: 3.1.24cd/.na tv eva hīna^saṃbandhaṃ kuryāt sadbhir vininditam//(p.197)
GS39kamasutu:951: āhāras tathā saptāhaṃ satūrya^maṅgala^snānaṃ prasādhanaṃ saha^bhojanaṃ ca prekṣā saṃbandhināṃ ca pūjanam/ iti sārva^varṇikam//(p.198)
GS39kamasutu:952: 3.2.2/.tasminn etāṃ niśi vijane mṛdubhir upacārair upakrameta//(p.198)
GS39kamasutu:953: 3.2.3/.trirātram avacanaṃ hi stambham iva nāyakaṃ paśyantī kanyā nirvidyeta paribhavec ca tṛtīyām iva prakṛtim/ iti bābhravīyāḥ//(p.199)
GS39kamasutu:954: 3.2.4/.upakrameta visrambhayec ca, na tu brahmacaryam ativarteta/ iti
GS39kamasutu:956: 3.2.6/.kusuma^sadharmāṇo hi yoṣitaḥ sukumāra^upakramāḥ/ tās tv anadhigata^viśvāsaiḥ prasabham upakramyamāṇāḥ saṃprayoga^dveṣiṇyo
GS39kamasutu:962: tad^apratipadyamānāṃ ca sāntvanair vākyaiḥ śapathaiḥ pratiyācitaiḥ pāda^patanaiś ca grāhayet/ vrīḍā^yuktā^api yoṣid^atyanta^kruddhā^api na
GS39kamasutu:966: 3.2.14/.tac^chravaṇa^arthaṃ yat kiṃ cid alpa^akṣara^abhidheyam ajānann iva pṛcchet/
GS39kamasutu:967: 3.2.15/.tatra niṣpratipattim anudvejayan sāntvanā yuktaṃ bahuśa eva
GS39kamasutu:970: 3.2.17/.sarvā eva hi kanyāḥ puruṣeṇa prayujyamānaṃ vacanaṃ viṣa^hante/ na tu laghu^miśrām api vācaṃ vadanti/ iti ghoṭakamukhaḥ//(p.201)
GS39kamasutu:971: 3.2.18/.nirbadhyamānā tu śiraḥ^kampena prativacanāni yojayet/ kalahe tu na
GS39kamasutu:973: 3.2.19/.icchasi māṃ na^icchasi vā kiṃ te +ahaṃ rucito na rucito vā^iti
GS39kamasutu:974: pṛṣṭā ciraṃ sthitvā nirbadhyamānā tadā^anukūlyena śiraḥ kampayet/
GS39kamasutu:976: 3.2.20/.saṃstutā cet sakhīm anukūlām ubhayato +api visrabdhāṃ tām antarā
GS39kamasutu:977: kṛtvā kathāṃ yojayet/ tasminn adhomukhī vihaset/ tāṃ ca^ativādinīm
GS39kamasutu:978: adhikṣiped vivadec ca/ sā tu parihāsa^artham idam anayā^uktam iti
GS39kamasutu:979: ca^anuktam (p.202) api brūyāt/ tatra tām apanudya prativacana^artham
GS39kamasutu:980: abhyarthyamānā tūṣṇīm āsīta/ nirbadhyamānā tu na^aham evaṃ bravīmi^ity
GS39kamasutu:982: anavasita^arthaṃ vacanaṃ brūyāt/ nāyakaṃ ca vihasantī kadā cit kaṭākṣaiḥ
GS39kamasutu:984: 3.2.21/.evaṃ jāta^paricayā ca^anirvadantī tat^samīpe yācitaṃ tāmbūlaṃ vilepanaṃ srajaṃ nidadhyāt/ uttarīye vā^asya nibadhnīyāt/
GS39kamasutu:986: 3.2.23/.vāryamāṇaś ca tvam api māṃ pariṣvajasva tato na^evam
GS39kamasutu:987: ācariṣyāmi^iti sthityā pariṣvañjayet/ svaṃ ca hastam ā nābhi^deśāt
GS39kamasutu:988: prasārya nirvartayet/ krameṇa ca^enām utsaṅgam āropya^adhikam adhikam
GS39kamasutu:990: 3.2.24/.ahaṃ khalu tava danta^padāny adhare kariṣyāmi stana^pṛṣṭhe ca
GS39kamasutu:991: nakha^padam/ ātmanaś ca svayaṃ kṛtvā tvayā kṛtam iti te sakhī^janasya
GS39kamasutu:992: purataḥ kathayiṣyāmi/ sā tvaṃ kim atra vakṣyasi^iti bāla^vibhīṣikair
GS39kamasutu:994: 3.2.25/.dvitīyasyāṃ tṛtīyasyāṃ ca rātrau kiṃ cid adhikaṃ visrambhitāṃ hastena yojayet//(p.204)
GS39kamasutu:997: krameṇa^ūru^mūlam api saṃvāhayet/ nivārite saṃvāhane ko doṣa ity ākulayed
GS39kamasutu:998: enām/ tac ca sthirīkuryāt/ tatra siddhāyā guhya^deśa^abhimarśanaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1001: yukta^yantrāṃ rañjayet/ na tv akāle vrata^khaṇḍanam
GS39kamasutu:1002: 3.2.29/.anuśiṣyāc ca/ ātma^anurāgaṃ darśayet/ manorathāṃś ca pūrva^kālikān
GS39kamasutu:1003: anuvarṇayet/ āyatyāṃ ca tadā^anukūlyena pravṛttiṃ pratijānīyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1004: sapatnībhyaś ca sādhvasam avacchindyāt/ kālena ca krameṇa
GS39kamasutu:1012: 3.2.32cd/.kanyā^visrambhaṇaṃ vetti yaḥ sa tāsāṃ priyo bhavet//(p.206)
GS39kamasutu:1016: 3.2.34cd/.bhayaṃ vitrāsam udvegaṃ sadyo dveṣaṃ ca gacchati//(p.207)
GS39kamasutu:1021: sadhano vā prātiveśyaḥ, mātṛ^pitṛ^bhrātṛṣu ca paratantraḥ, bāla^vṛttir
GS39kamasutu:1022: ucita^praveśo vā kanyām alabhyatvān na varayet/
GS39kamasutu:1025: mātrā ca pitrā ca viyuktaḥ paribhūta^kalpo dhana^utkarṣā^dalabhyāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1028: 3.3.5/.bālāyām evaṃ sati dharma^adhigame saṃvananaṃ ślāghyam iti
GS39kamasutu:1030: bhakta^pāna^karaṇam iti kurvīta/ paricayasya vayasaś ca^anurūpyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1035: anila^tāḍitakāṃ godhūma^puñjikām aṅguli^tāḍitakāṃ sakhībhir anyāni ca
GS39kamasutu:1036: 3.3.9/.yāṃ ca viśvāsyām asyāṃ manyeta tayā saha nirantarāṃ prītiṃ kuryāt/
GS39kamasutu:1038: 3.3.10/.dhātreyikāṃ ca^asyāḥ priya^hitābhyām adhikam upagṛhṇīyāt/ sā hi prīyamāṇā vidita^ākārā^apy apratyādiśantī taṃ tāṃ ca yojayituṃ śaknuyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1042: 3.3.12/.yatra yatra ca kautukaṃ prayojyāyās tad anu praviśya sādhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1043: 3.3.13/.krīḍanaka^dravyāṇi yāny apūrvāṇi yāny anyāsāṃ viralaśo vidyeraṃs
GS39kamasutu:1045: 3.3.14/.tatra kandukam aneka^bhakti^citram alpa^kāla^antaritam anyad anyac ca saṃdarśayet/ tathā sūtra^dāru^gavala^gaja^danta^mayīr duhitṛkā
GS39kamasutu:1055: pūga^phalānāṃ pattrāṇāṃ kāla^yuktānāṃ ca śakti^viṣaye pracchannaṃ dānaṃ prakāśa^dravyāṇāṃ ca prakāśam/ yathā ca sarva^abhiprāya^saṃvardhakam enaṃ manyeta tathā prayatitavyam/
GS39kamasutu:1057: 3.3.18/.pracchanna^dānasya tu kāraṇam ātmano guru^janād bhayaṃ khyāpayet/
GS39kamasutu:1061: 3.3.20/.vismayeṣu prasahyamānām indra^jālaiḥ prayogair vismāpayet/ kalāsu kautukinīṃ tat^kauśalena gīta^priyāṃ śruti^harair gītaiḥ/ āśvayujyām
GS39kamasutu:1062: aṣṭamī^candrake kaumudyām utsaveṣu yātrāyāṃ grahaṇe gṛha^ācāre vā vicitrair āpīḍaiḥ *karṇa[ch:karṇaṃ]^pattra^bhaṅgaiḥ
GS39kamasutu:1063: vastra^aṅgulīyaka^bhūṣaṇa^dānaiś ca/ no ced doṣa^karāṇi manyeta/
GS39kamasutu:1068: 3.3.23/.udāra^veṣaś ca svayam anupahata^darśanaś syāt/ bhāvaṃ ca kurvatīm
GS39kamasutu:1070: 3.3.24/.yuvatayo hi saṃsṛṣṭam abhīkṣṇa^darśanaṃ ca puruṣaṃ prathamaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1071: kāmayante/ kāmayamānā api tu na^abhiyuñjata iti prāyovādaḥ/ iti bālāyām upakramāḥ//(p.211)
GS39kamasutu:1073: 3.3.26/.saṃmukhaṃ taṃ tu na vīkṣate/ vīkṣitā vrīḍāṃ darśayati/ rucyam ātmano +aṅgam apadeśena prakāśayati/ pramattaṃ pracchannaṃ nāyakam
GS39kamasutu:1075: 3.3.27/.pṛṣṭā ca kiṃ cit sasmitam avyakta^akṣaram anavasitā^arthaṃ ca mandaṃ mandam adhomukhī kathayati/ tat^samīpe ciraṃ sthānam abhinandati/
GS39kamasutu:1076: dūre sthitā paśyatu mām iti manyamānā parijanaṃ savadana^vikāram ābhāṣate/
GS39kamasutu:1078: 3.3.28/.yat kiṃ cid dṛṣṭvā vihasitaṃ karoti/ tatra kathām avasthāna^artham
GS39kamasutu:1080: paricārikāyās tilakaṃ ca racayati/ parijanānavaṣṭabhya tās tāś ca līlā darśayati/
GS39kamasutu:1081: 3.3.29/.tan^mitreṣu viśvasiti/ vacanaṃ ca^eṣāṃ bahu manyate karoti ca/
GS39kamasutu:1082: tat^paricārakaiḥ saha prītiṃ saṃkathāṃ dyūtam iti ca karoti/ svakarmasu ca prabhaviṣṇur iva^etān niyuñkte/ teṣu ca nāyaka^saṃkathām anyasya kathayatsv avahitā tāṃ śṛṇoti/
GS39kamasutu:1083: 3.3.30/.dhātreyikayā coditā nāyakasya^udavasitaṃ praviśati/ tām antarā kṛtvā tena saha dyūtaṃ krīḍām ālāpaṃ ca^āyojayitum icchati/ analaṃkṛtā
GS39kamasutu:1084: darśana^pathaṃ (p.214)pariharati/ karṇa^pattram aṅgulīyakaṃ srajaṃ vā tena yācitā sadhīram eva gātrād avatārya sakhyā haste dadāti/ tena ca dattaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1085: nityaṃ dhārayati/ anya^vara^saṃkathāsu viṣaṇṇā bhavati/ tat^pakṣakaiś
GS39kamasutu:1086: ca saha na saṃsṛjyata iti//(p.215) bhavataś ca^atra ślokau ---(p.215)
GS39kamasutu:1093: 3.4.2/.dyūte krīḍanakeṣu ca vivadamānaḥ sākāram asyāḥ pāṇim
GS39kamasutu:1097: 3.4.6/.jala^krīḍāyāṃ tad^dūrato +apsu nimagnaḥ samīpam asyā gatvā spṛṣṭvā ca^enāṃ tatra^eva^unmajjet//(p.217)
GS39kamasutu:1109: 3.4.19/.vijane tamasi ca dvandvam āsīnaḥ kṣāntiṃ kruvīta/
GS39kamasutu:1112: 3.4.21/.vivikte ca kiṃ cid asti kathayitavyam ity uktvā nirvacanaṃ bhāvaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1114: 3.4.22/.vidita^bhāvas tu vyādhim apadiśya^enāṃ vārtā^grahaṇa^arthaṃ svam udavasitam ānayet//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:1115: 3.4.23/.āgatāyāś ca śiraḥ^pīḍane niyogaḥ/ pāṇim avalambya ca^asyāḥ sākāraṃ nayanayor lalāṭe ca nidadhyāt//(p.219)
GS39kamasutu:1117: 3.4.25/.idaṃ tvayā kartavyam/ na hy etad ṛte kanyayā anyena kāryam iti gacchantīṃ punar āgamana^anubandham enāṃ visṛjet//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:1118: 3.4.26/.asya ca yogasya trirātraṃ trisaṃdhyaṃ ca prayuktiḥ//(p.220)
GS39kamasutu:1120: 3.4.28/.anyābhir api saha viśvāsana^artham adhikam adhikaṃ ca^abhiyuñjīta/
GS39kamasutu:1125: surata^(p.220)vyavasāyinyo rāgavatyaś ca bhavanti/ na ca puruṣaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1126: pratyācakṣate/ tasmāt tatkālaṃ prayojayitavyā iti prāyovādaḥ//(p.221)
GS39kamasutu:1127: 3.4.32/.eka^puruṣa^abhiyogānāṃ tv asaṃbhave gṛhīta^arthayā dhātreyikayā sakhyā vā tasyām antarbhūtayā tam artham anirvadantyā saha^enām aṅkam
GS39kamasutu:1130: 3.4.34/.yajñe vivāhe yātrāyām utsave vyasane prekṣaṇaka^vyāpṛte jane tatra tatra ca dṛṣṭa^iṅgita^ākārāṃ parīkṣita^bhāvām ekākinīm upakrameta/
GS39kamasutu:1131: 3.4.35/.na hi dṛṣṭa^bhāvā yoṣito deśe kāle ca prayujyamānā vyāvartanta iti
GS39kamasutu:1133: 3.4.36/.manda^apadeśā guṇavaty api kanyā dhana^hīnā kulīnā^api samānair ayācyāmānā mātā^pitṛ^viyuktā vā jñāti^kula^vartinī vā prāpta^yauvanā
GS39kamasutu:1136: 3.4.38/.yaṃ vā manyeta mātā^pitror asamīkṣayā svayam apy ayam
GS39kamasutu:1139: 3.4.39/.mātā ca^enāṃ sakhībhir dhātreyikābhiś ca saha tad^abhimukhīṃ
GS39kamasutu:1141: kalā^kauśala^prakāśane vā saṃvāhane śirasaḥ pīḍane ca^aucitya^darśanam/
GS39kamasutu:1142: prayojyasya sātmya^yuktāḥ kathā^yogāḥ bālāyām upakrameṣu yathoktam
GS39kamasutu:1143: 3.4.41/.na ca^eva^antarā^api puruṣaṃ svayam abhiyuñjīta/ svayam abhiyoginī hi yuvatiḥ saubhāgyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1145: 3.4.43/.pariṣvaktā ca na vikṛtiṃ bhajet/ ślakṣṇam ākāram ajānatī^iva
GS39kamasutu:1149: 3.4.46/.yadā tu manyeta^anurakto mayi na vyāvartiṣyata iti tadā^eva^enam
GS39kamasutu:1153: 3.4.48b/.anukūlaṃ ca vaśyaṃ ca tasya kuryāt parigraham//(p.224)
GS39kamasutu:1159: 3.4.51b/.guṇair yukto +api na tv evaṃ bahu^sādhāraṇaḥ patiḥ//(p.225)
GS39kamasutu:1162: 3.4.53a/.nīco yas tv abhiyuñjīta puruṣaḥ palito +api vā/
GS39kamasutu:1165: 3.4.54b/.sapatnīkaś ca sa^apatyo na sa saṃyogam arhati//
GS39kamasutu:1170: 3.5.2/.sā ca^enām aviditā nāma nāyakasya bhūtvā tad^guṇair anurañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:1171: tasyāś ca rucyān nāyaka^guṇān bhūyiṣṭham upavarṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1173: 3.5.4/.mātā^pitroś ca guṇān abhijñatāṃ lubdhatāṃ ca capalatāṃ ca
GS39kamasutu:1175: 3.5.5/.yāś ca^anyā api samāna^jātīyāḥ kanyāḥ śakuntalā^ādyāḥ svabuddhyā bhartāraṃ prāpya saṃprayuktā modante sma tāś ca^asyā nidarśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1181: 3.5.9/.samanorathāyāś ca^asyā apāyaṃ sādhvasaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca hetubhir avacchindyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1183: 3.5.11/.tvām ajānatīm iva nāyako balād grahīṣyati^iti tathā suparigṛhītaṃ syād iti yojayet//(p.227)
GS39kamasutu:1185: agnim ānāyya kuśān āstīrya yathāsmṛti hutvā ca triḥ parikramet/
GS39kamasutu:1187: 3.5.14/.agni^sākṣikā hi vivāhā na nivartanta ity ācārya^samayaḥ//(p.228)
GS39kamasutu:1189: 3.5.16/.tad^bāndhavāś ca yathā kulasya^adhaṃ pariharanto daṇḍa^bhayāc ca tasmā eva^enāṃ dadyus tathā yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1190: 3.5.17/.anantaraṃ ca prīty^upagraheṇa rāgeṇa tad^bāndhavān prīṇayed iti/
GS39kamasutu:1193: pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭāṃ prīyamāṇāṃ ca^upagṛhya tayā saha viṣahyam avakāśam enām anya^kārya^apadeśena^ānayayet/
GS39kamasutu:1195: 3.5.21/.āsanne ca vivāhe mātaram asyās tad abhimata^doṣair anuśayaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1199: 3.5.23/.bhrātaram asyā vā samāna^vayasaṃ veśyāsu parastrīṣu vā prasaktam asukareṇa sāhāya^dānena priya^upagrahaiś ca sudīrgha^kālam anurañjayet/
GS39kamasutu:1201: 3.5.24/.prāyeṇa hi yuvānaḥ samāna^śīla^vyasana^vayasāṃ vayasyānām arthe jīvitam api tyajanti/ tatas tena^eva^anyakāryāt tām ānāyayet/ viṣahyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1203: 3.5.25/.aṣṭamī^candrika^ādiṣu ca dhātreyikā madanīyam enāṃ pāyayitvā kiṃ
GS39kamasutu:1204: cid ātmanaḥ kāryam uddiśya nāyakasya viṣahyaṃ deśam ānayet/ tatra^enāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1205: madāt saṃjñām apratipadyamānāṃ dūṣayitvā^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa//(p.230)
GS39kamasutu:1209: nāyakas tadā rakṣiṇo vitrāsya hatvā vā kanyām apaharet/ iti
GS39kamasutu:1210: 3.5.28a/.pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pradhānaṃ syād vivāho dharmataḥ sthiteḥ/(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1211: 3.5.28b/.pūrva^abhāve tataḥ kāryo yo ya uttara uttaraḥ//(p.231)
GS39kamasutu:1227: apā^gulmān anyāṃś ca bahu^puṣpān bālaka^uśīraka^pātālikāṃś ca
GS39kamasutu:1231: 4.1.10/.bhojane ca rucitam idam asmai dveṣyam idaṃ pathyam idam apathyam
GS39kamasutu:1233: 4.1.11/.svaraṃ bahir upaśrutya bhavanam āgacchataḥ kiṃ kṛtyam iti bruvatī sajjā bhavana^madhye
GS39kamasutu:1235: 4.1.13/.nāyakasya ca na vimukta^bhūṣaṇaṃ vijane saṃdarśane tiṣṭhet//(p.235)
GS39kamasutu:1237: 4.1.15/.āvāhe vivāhe yajñe gamanaṃ sakhībhiḥ saha goṣṭhīṃ
GS39kamasutu:1240: 4.1.17/.paścāt saṃveśanaṃ pūrvam utthānam anavabodhanaṃ ca suptasya//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1247: nirīkṣaṇaṃ vā niṣkuṭeṣu mantraṇaṃ vivikteṣu ciram avasthānam iti varjayet//(p.236)
GS39kamasutu:1252: na^atyulbaṇam anulepanam/ tathā śuklāny anyāni puṣpāṇi^iti vaihāriko
GS39kamasutu:1253: 4.1.26/.nāyakasya vratam upavāsaṃ ca svayam api karaṇena^anuvarteta/
GS39kamasutu:1254: vāritāyāṃ ca na^aham atra nirbandhanīya^iti tad^vacaso nivartanam//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1256: 4.1.28/.tathā lavaṇa^snehayoś ca gandha^dravya^kaṭuka^bhāṇḍa^oṣadhānāṃ ca durlabhānāṃ bhavanesu pracchannaṃ nidhānam//(p.237)
GS39kamasutu:1259: sarva^oṣadhīnāṃ ca bīja^grahaṇaṃ kāle vāpaś ca//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1261: 4.1.31/.samānāś ca striyaḥ kauśalena^ujjvalatayā pākena mānena tathā^upacārair atiśayīta//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1269: ṇām avekṣaṇam/ daivasikāya^vyaya^piṇḍīkaraṇam iti ca vidyāt//(p.238)
GS39kamasutu:1271: śuddhair vā kṛta^karmaṇāṃ paricārakāṇām anugraho māna^artheṣu ca dānam anyatra vā^upayogaḥ//(p.239)
GS39kamasutu:1281: 4.1.41/.svakarmasu bhṛtyajana^niyamanam utsaveṣu ca^asya pūjanam ity ekacāriṇī^vṛttam//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1282: 4.1.42/.pravāse maṅgala^mātra^ābharaṇā devatā^upavāsa^parā vārtāyāṃ sthitā gṛhān avekṣeta//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1284: nāyaka^abhimatānāṃ ca^arthānām arjane pratisaṃskāre ca yatnaḥ//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1285: 4.1.44/.nitya^naimittikeṣu karmasu^ucito vyayaḥ/ tad^ārabdhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ samāpane matiḥ//(p.240)
GS39kamasutu:1289: 4.1.46/.guru^jana^anujñātānāṃ karaṇam upavāsānām/ paricārakaiḥ śucibhir ājñā^adhiṣṭhitair anumatena kraya^vikraya^karmaṇā sārasya^āpūraṇaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1291: 4.1.47/.āgate ca prakṛtisthāyā eva prathamato darśanaṃ daivata^pūjanam
GS39kamasutu:1292: upahārāṇāṃ ca^āharaṇam iti pravāsa^caryā//(p.241) bhavataś ca^atra ślokau/
GS39kamasutu:1295: 4.1.49ab/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ labhante sthānam eva ca/(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1300: prajān utpattau ca svayam eva sāpatnake codayet//(p.242)
GS39kamasutu:1302: 4.2.4/.āgatāṃ ca^enāṃ bhaginīvad īkṣeta/ nāyaka^viditaṃ ca prādoṣikaṃ vidhim atīva yatnād asyāḥ kārayet saubhāgyajaṃ vaikṛtam utsekaṃ vā^asyā
GS39kamasutu:1303: 4.2.5/.bhartari pramādyantīm upekṣeta/ yatra manyeta^artham iyaṃ svayam api pratipatsyata iti tatra^enām ādarata eva^anuśiṣyāt//(p.243)
GS39kamasutu:1308: 4.2.9/.yāṃ tu nāyako +adhikāṃ cikīrṣet tāṃ bhūta^pūrva^subhagayā protsāhya
GS39kamasutu:1312: 4.2.14/.mandaṃ vā kalaham upalabhya svayam eva saṃdhukṣayet//(p.245)
GS39kamasutu:1313: 4.2.15/.yadi nāyako +asyām adya^api sānunaya iti manyeta tadā svayam eva
GS39kamasutu:1325: 4.2.26/.tat tu ślāghayā rāgeṇa vā bahir na^acakṣīta//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1328: 4.2.29/.durbhagām anapatyāṃ ca jyeṣṭhām anukampeta nāyakena ca^anukampayet//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1329: 4.2.30/.prasahya tv enām ekacāriṇī^vṛttam anutiṣṭhed iti kaniṣṭhā^vṛttam//(p.246)
GS39kamasutu:1330: 4.2.31/.vidhavā tv indriya^daurbalyād āturā bhoginaṃ guṇa^saṃpannaṃ ca yā punar vindet sā punarbhūḥ//(p.247)
GS39kamasutu:1331: 4.2.32/.yatas tu svecchayā punar api niṣkramaṇaṃ nirguṇo +ayam iti tadā anyaṃ kāṅkṣed iti
GS39kamasutu:1333: 4.2.34/.guṇeṣu sopabhogeṣu sukha^sākalyaṃ tasmāt tato viśeṣa iti
GS39kamasutu:1337: 4.2.37/.ātmanaḥ sāreṇa vālaṃkāraṃ tadīyam ātmīyaṃ vā bibhṛyāt//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1338: 4.2.39/.svecchayā ca gṛhān nirgacchantī prīti^dāyād anyan nāyaka^dattaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1339: jīyeta/ niṣkāsyamānā tu na kiṃ cid dadyāt//(p.248)
GS39kamasutu:1345: 4.2.44/.rahasi ca kalayā catuḥṣaṣṭyā^anuvarteta/ sapatnīnāṃ ca svayam
GS39kamasutu:1347: upacāraḥ/ maṇḍanakāni veṣān ādareṇa kurvīta/ parijane mitravarge ca^adhikaṃ viśrāṇanam/ samāja^āpānaka^udyānayātrā^vihāra^śīlatā ca^iti
GS39kamasutu:1348: 4.2.45/.durbhagā tu sāpatnaka^pīḍitā yā tāsām adhikam iva patyāv upacaret
GS39kamasutu:1352: 4.2.47/.tan mitrāṇi ca^upagṛhya tair bhaktim ātmanaḥ prakāśayet//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1357: 4.2.52/.yayā ca kalahitaḥ syāt kāmaṃ tām āvartayet//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1358: 4.2.53/.yāṃ ca pracchannāṃ kāmayet tām anena saha saṃgamayed gopayec ca//(p.250)
GS39kamasutu:1359: 4.2.54/.yathā ca pativratātvam aśāṭhyaṃ nāyako manyeta tathā prativid adhyād iti durbhagā^vṛttam//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1360: 4.2.55/.antaḥpurāṇāṃ ca vṛttam eteṣv eva prakaraṇeṣu lakṣayet//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1361: 4.2.56/.mālyā^anulepana^vāsāṃsi ca^āsāṃ kañcukīyā mahattarikā vā rājño nivedayeyur devībhiḥ prahitam iti/
GS39kamasutu:1365: 4.2.59/.tāsāṃ yathā^kālaṃ yathā^arhaṃ ca sthāna^māna^anuvṛttiḥ saparihāsāś ca kathāḥ kuryāt//(p.251)
GS39kamasutu:1369: 4.2.63/.vāsaka^pālyas tu yasyā vāsako yasyāś ca^atīto yasyāś ca ṛtus
GS39kamasutu:1370: tat^paricārika^anugatā divā śayyā^utthitasya rājñas tābhyāṃ prahitam
GS39kamasutu:1371: aṅgulīyaka^aṅkam anulepanam ṛtuṃ vāsakaṃ ca nivedayeyuḥ/(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1372: 4.2.64/.tatra rājā yad gṛhṇīyāt tasyā vāsakam ājñāpayet//(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1373: 4.2.65/.utsaveṣu ca sarvāsām anurūpeṇa pūjā^āpānakaṃ ca/ saṃgīta^darśaneṣu
GS39kamasutu:1375: vidita^śaucābhyaḥ/ aparikliṣṭaś ca karma^yoga ity āntaḥpurikam//(p.252)
GS39kamasutu:1377: 4.2.67ab/.puruṣas tu bahūn dārān samāhṛtya samo bhavet/(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1378: 4.2.67cd/.na ca^avajñāṃ cared āsu vyalīkān na saheta ca//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1380: 4.2.68cd/.visrambhād vā^apy upālambhas tam anyāsu na kīrtayet//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1381: 4.2.69ab/.na dadyāt prasaraṃ strīṇāṃ sapatnyāḥ kāraṇe kva cit/(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1384: 4.2.70cd/.bahu^mānais tathā ca^anyām ity evaṃ rañjayet striyaḥ//(p.253)
GS39kamasutu:1390: 5.1.strīpuruṣaśīlavasthāpanaṃ vyāvartanakāraṇāṇi strīṣu siddhāḥ puruṣā ayatnasādhyā yoṣitaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1391: 5.1.2/.teṣu sādhyatvam anatyayaṃ gamyatvam āyatiṃ vṛttiṃ ca^ādita eva
GS39kamasutu:1393: 5.1.3/.yadā tu sthānāt sthāna^antaraṃ kāmaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ paśyet
GS39kamasutu:1396: 5.1.5/.cakṣuḥ^prītir manaḥ^saṅgaḥ saṃkalpa^utpattir nidrā^ācchedas tanutā viṣayebhyo vyāvṛttir lajjā^praṇāśa unmādo mūrchā maraṇam iti teṣāṃ liṅgāni//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1397: 5.1.6/.tatra^ākṛtito lakṣaṇataś ca yuvatyāḥ śīlaṃ satyaṃ śaucaṃ sādhyatāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1399: 5.1.7/.vyabhicārād ākṛti^lakṣaṇa^yogānām iṅgita^ākārābhyām eva pravṛttir boddhavyā yoṣita iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.256)
GS39kamasutu:1400: 5.1.8/.yaṃ kaṃ cid ujjvalaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā strī kāmayate/ tathā puruṣo +api yoṣitam/ apekṣayā tu na *pravartata[ch:pravartate] iti goṇikāputraḥ//
GS39kamasutu:1402: 5.1.10/.na strī dharmam adharmaṃ ca^apekṣate kāmayata eva/ kārya^apekṣayā
GS39kamasutu:1409: 5.1.15/.niṣkāraṇam abhiyuṅkte/ abhiyujyāpi punar na^abhiyuṅkte/ siddhāyāṃ ca mādhyasthyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1441: priyasya kartā^anyasya bhūta^pūrvo dūto marmajña uttamayā prārthitaḥ sakhyā pracchannaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ subhaga^abhikhyātaḥ saha saṃvṛddhaḥ prātiveśyaḥ kāma^śīlas tathā^bhūtaś
GS39kamasutu:1443: prekṣa^udyāna^tyāga^śīlo vṛṣa iti siddha^pratāpaḥ sāhasikaḥ śūro vidyā^rūpa^guṇa^upabhogaiḥ patyur atiśayitā mahārha^veṣa^upacāraś
GS39kamasutu:1448: pārśva^vilokinī/ niṣkāraṇaṃ sapatnyādhivinnā/ bhartṛ^dveṣiṇī vidviṣṭā ca/
GS39kamasutu:1451: kuśīlava^bhāryā/ mṛta^patikā bālā/ daridrā bahu^upabhogā/ jyeṣṭha^bhāryā
GS39kamasutu:1454: 5.1.54/.kanyā^kāle yatnena varitā kathaṃ cid alabdha^abhiyuktā ca sā tadānīṃ samāna^buddhi^śīla^medhā^pratipatti^sātmyā/ prakṛtyā pakṣa^pātinī/
GS39kamasutu:1455: anaparādhe vimānitā/ tulya^rūpābhiś ca^adhaḥ kṛtā/ proṣita^patikā^iti/
GS39kamasutu:1463: 5.2.1/.yathā^kanyā svayam abhiyoga^sādhyā na tathā dūtyā/ para^striyas tu
GS39kamasutu:1469: 5.2.4/.svayam abhiyokṣyamāṇas tv ādāv eva paricayaṃ kuryāt//(p.265)
GS39kamasutu:1473_0: 5.2.7 /.darśane ca^asyāḥ satataṃ sākāraṃ prekṣaṇaṃ keśa^saṃyamanaṃ nakhāc churaṇam ābharaṇa^prahlādanam adhara^oṣṭha^vimardanaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1473_1: tās tāś ca līlā vayasyaiḥ saha prekṣamāṇāyās tat^saṃbaddhāḥ para^apadeśinyaś ca kathās tyāga^upabhoga^prakāśanaṃ sakhyur
GS39kamasutu:1474: jṛṃbhaṇam ekabhrū^kṣepaṇaṃ manda^vākyatā tad^vākya^śravaṇaṃ tām uddiśya bālena^anya^janena vā sahānya^upadiṣṭā dvyarthā kathā tasyāṃ svayaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1475_0: manoratha^avedanam anya^apadeśena tām eva^uddiśya bāla^cumbanam āliṅganaṃ ca jihvayā ca^asya tāmbūla^dānaṃ pradeśinyā hanu^deśa^ghaṭṭanaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1475_1: tat tad yathā^yogaṃ yathā^avakāśaṃ ca prayoktavyam /
GS39kamasutu:1477: dānaṃ grahaṇaṃ tena saṃnikṛṣṭatvāt kathā^yojanaṃ tat^saṃbhāṣaṇa^kṣameṇa
GS39kamasutu:1478: janena ca prītim āsādya kāryaṃ tad^anubandhaṃ ca gamana^agamanasya yojanaṃ saṃśraye ca^asyās tām apaśyato nāma kāmasūtra^saṃkathā//(p.266)
GS39kamasutu:1479: 5.2.9/.prasṛte tu paricaye tasyā haste nyāsaṃ nikṣepaṃ ca nidadhyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1482: 5.2.10/.tām ātmano dāraiḥ saha visrambha^goṣṭhyāṃ vivikta^āsane ca yojayet
GS39kamasutu:1485: kāma^arthinyāṃ saha^ātmano vaśyaiś ca^eṣāṃ tat^saṃpādane svayaṃ prayateta/
GS39kamasutu:1488: 5.1.15/.yena karmaṇā dravyeṇa kauśalena ca^arthinī syāt tasya prayogam
GS39kamasutu:1489: utpattim āgamam upāyaṃ vijñānaṃ ca^ātma^āyattaṃ darśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1490: 5.2.16/.pūrva^pravṛtteṣu loka^cariteṣu dravya^guṇa^parīkṣāsu ca tayā tat^parijanena ca saha vivādaḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1491: 5.2.17/.tatra nirdiṣṭāni paṇitāni teṣv enāṃ prāśnikatvena yojayet/
GS39kamasutu:1492: 5.2.18/.tayā tu vivadamāno +atyantād bhutam iti brūyād iti
GS39kamasutu:1495: asaṃprayuktatvāt/ itarāsu tān eva sphuṭam upadadhyāt/ saṃprayuktatvāt/
GS39kamasutu:1498: 5.2.21/.tatra mahārha^gandham uttarīyaṃ kusumaṃ *ca ātmīyaṃ[ch:omits] syād aṅgulīyakaṃ ca/ tad^dhastād gṛhīta^tāmbūlayā goṣṭhī^gamana^udyatasya
GS39kamasutu:1503: 5.2.24/.krameṇa ca vivikta^deśe gamanam āliṅganaṃ cumbanaṃ tāmbūlasya grāhaṇaṃ dāna^ante dravyāṇāṃ parivartanaṃ guhya^deśa^abhimarśanaṃ ca^ity
GS39kamasutu:1504: 5.2.25/.yatra ca^eka^abhiyuktā na tatra^aparām abhiyuñjīta/ tatra yā vṛddha^anubhūta^viṣayā priya^upagrahaiś ca tām upagṛhṇīyāt//(p.270) ślokāv atra bhavataḥ ---(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1506: 5.2.27cd/.na tatra yoṣitaṃ kāṃ cit suprāpām api laṅghayet//(p.270)
GS39kamasutu:1510: 5.3.1/.abhiyuñjāno yoṣitaḥ pravṛttiṃ parīkṣeta/ tayā bhāvaḥ parīkṣito
GS39kamasutu:1515: 5.3.4/.apratigṛhya^abhiyogaṃ saviśeṣam alaṃkṛtā ca punar dṛśyeta tathā^eva
GS39kamasutu:1516: tam abhigacchec ca vivikte balād grahaṇīyāṃ vidyāt//(p.271)
GS39kamasutu:1517: 5.3.5/.bahūn api viṣa^hate +abhiyogān na ca cireṇa^api prayacchaty ātmānaṃ sā śuṣka^pratigrāhiṇī
GS39kamasutu:1518: 5.3.7/.abhiyukta^api pariharati/ na ca saṃsṛjyate/ na ca pratyācaṣṭe/
GS39kamasutu:1519: tasminn ātmani ca gaurava^abhimānāt/ sa^atiparicayāt kṛcchra^sādhyā/
GS39kamasutu:1525: 5.3.11/.samīpe śayānāyāḥ supto nāma karam upari vinyaset/ sāpi
GS39kamasutu:1535: bhavati/ śiraḥ^pīḍane saṃvāhane ca^ūrvor ātmānaṃ nāyake niyojayati/
GS39kamasutu:1536: 5.3.17/.āturā saṃvāhikā ca^ekena hastena saṃvāhayantī dvitīyena bāhunā sparśam āvedayati śleṣayati ca/ vismita^bhāvā/
GS39kamasutu:1538: ali^kaika^deśam ūrvor upari pātayati/ ūrū^mūla^saṃvāhane niyuktā na pratilomayati/ tatra^eva hastam ekam avicalaṃ nyasyati/ aṅga^saṃdaṃśena ca pīḍitaṃ cirād apanayati/
GS39kamasutu:1544: 5.3.22/.saṃnikṛṣṭa^paricāraka^upabhogyā sā ced ākāritā^api tathā^eva syāt sā marmajñayā dūtyā
GS39kamasutu:1552: 5.3.26cd/.kṣipram eva^abhiyojyā sā prathame tv eva darśane//(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1553: 5.3.27ab/.ślakṣṇam ākāritā yā tu darśayet sphuṭam uttaram/(p.275)
GS39kamasutu:1556: 5.3.28cd/.eṣa sūkṣmo vidhiḥ proktaḥ siddhā eva sphuṭaṃ striyaḥ//(p.276)
GS39kamasutu:1560: loka^vṛtta^antaiḥ kavi^kathābhiḥ pāra^dārika^kathābhiś ca tasyāś ca
GS39kamasutu:1562: 5.4.3/.katham evaṃ vidhāyās tava^ayam ithaṃbhūtaḥ patir^iti ca^anuśayaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1564: 5.4.4/.na tava subhage dāsyam api kartuṃ yukta iti brūyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1566: kadaryatāṃ capalatām anyāni ca yāni tasmin guptāny asyā abhyāśe sati sadbhāve +atiśayena bhāṣeta/
GS39kamasutu:1572: 5.4.10/.sā nāyakasya caritam anulomatāṃ kāmitāni ca kathayet/
GS39kamasutu:1574: 5.4.12/.śṛṇu vicitram idaṃ subhage, tvāṃ kila dṛṣṭvā^amutra^asāv itthaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1575: gotra^putro nāyakaś citta^unmādam anubhavati/ prakṛtyā sukumāraḥ kadā cid
GS39kamasutu:1576: anyatra^aparikliṣṭa^pūrvas tapasvī/ tato +adhunā śakyam anena maraṇam apy anubhavitum iti
GS39kamasutu:1577: 5.4.13/.tatra siddhā dvitīye +ahani vāci vaktre dṛṣṭyāṃ ca prasādam upalakṣya punar api kathāṃ pravartayet/
GS39kamasutu:1581: (yā) ca^asya pracchannaṃ saṃprayogaṃ bhūtam abhūta^pūrvaṃ vā varṇayet/
GS39kamasutu:1585: 5.4.19/.kvāsitaṃ kva śayitaṃ *kva[ch:omits] bhuktaṃ kva ceṣṭitaṃ kiṃ vā kṛtam iti pṛcchati/
GS39kamasutu:1592: 5.4.26/.sādhuvādinī satī kim idam aśobhanam abhidhatsa iti kathām
GS39kamasutu:1595: 5.4.28/.pūrva^pravṛttaṃ ca tat^saṃdarśanaṃ kathā^abhiyogaṃ ca svayam akathayantī tayā^ucyamānam
GS39kamasutu:1596: 5.4.29/.nāyaka^manoratheṣu ca kathyamāneṣu saparibhavaṃ nāma hasati/ na ca nirvadati^iti//(p.279)
GS39kamasutu:1603: 5.4.36/.tāsāṃ manoharāṇy upāyanāni tāmbūlam anulepanaṃ srajam aṅgulīyakaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1605: 5.4.37/.teṣu nāyakasya yathā^arthaṃ nakha^daśana^padāni tāni tāni ca
GS39kamasutu:1615: cakra^ārohaṇe prekṣā^vyāpāreṣu teṣu teṣu ca kāryeṣv iti bābhravīyāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1619: praveśanam upapannaṃ niṣkramaṇam avijñāta^kālaṃ ca tan nityaṃ sukha^upāyaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1623: 5.4.46/.nāyakasya nāyikāyāś ca yathā^manīṣitam artham upalabhya sva^buddhyā kārya^saṃpādinī
GS39kamasutu:1632: 5.4.54/.dautyena prahita^anyayā svayam eva nāyakam abhigacched ajānatī nāma tena saha^upabhogaṃ svapne vā kathayet/ gotra^skhalitaṃ bhāryāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1633: ca^asya nindet/ tad^vyapadeśena svayam īrṣyāṃ darśayet/
GS39kamasutu:1634: nakha^daśana^cihnitaṃ vā kiṃ cid dadyāt/ bhavate +aham adau dātuṃ saṃkalpitā^iti ca^abhidadhīta/ mama bhāryāyā kā ramanīyā^iti vivikte paryanuyuñjīta sā svayaṃ^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1637: saṃdeśa^śrāvaṇa^dvāreṇa nāyakaṃ sādhayet tāṃ ca^upahanyāt sā^api
GS39kamasutu:1640: 5.4.58/.nāyaka^bhāryāṃ mugdhāṃ viśvāsya^ayantraṇayā^anupraviśya nāyakasya ceṣṭitāni pṛcchet/ yogāñ śikṣayet/ sākāraṃ maṇḍayet/ kopam enāṃ grāhayet/
GS39kamasutu:1641: evaṃ ca pratipadyasva^iti śrāvayet/ svayaṃ ca^asyāṃ nakha^daśana^padāni
GS39kamasutu:1642: nirvartayet/ tena dvāreṇa nāyakam ākārayet sā mūḍha^dūtī//(p.285)
GS39kamasutu:1644: 5.4.60/.sva^bhāryāṃ vā mūḍhāṃ prayojya tayā saha viśvāsena yojayitvā
GS39kamasutu:1645: tayā^eva^ākārayet/ ātmanaś ca vaicakṣaṇyaṃ prakāśayet/ sā bhāryā dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1647_0: 5.4.61 /.bālāṃ vā paricārikām adoṣajñām aduṣṭena^upāyena prahiṇuyāt / tatra sraji karṇa^pattre vā gūḍha^lekha^nidhānaṃ nakha^daśana^padaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1647_1: vā sā mūka^dūtī / tasyās tayā eva pratyuttara^prārthanam //(p.286)
GS39kamasutu:1649: laukika^arthaṃ dvyarthaṃ vā vacanam udāsīnā yā śrāvayet sā vāta^dūtī/
GS39kamasutu:1650: tasyā api tayā^eva pratyuttara^prārthanam iti tāsāṃ viśeṣāḥ//(p.286)
GS39kamasutu:1661: 5.5.1/.na rājñāṃ mahāmātrāṇāṃ vā parabhavana^praveśo vidyate/ mahājanena hi caritam eṣāṃ dṛśyate +anuvidhīyate ca//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1662: 5.5.2/.savitāram udyantaṃ trayo lokāḥ paśyanti anūdyante ca/ gacchantam api paśyanty anupratiṣṭhante
GS39kamasutu:1663: 5.5.3/.tasmād aśakyatvād garhaṇīyatvāc ca^iti na te vṛthā kiṃ cid ācareyuḥ//(p.288)
GS39kamasutu:1666: grāmīṇa^yoṣito vacana^mātra^sādhyāḥ/ tāś carṣaṇya ity ācakṣate
GS39kamasutu:1670: kraya^vikraya^vinimayeṣu teṣu teṣu ca karmasu saṃprayogaḥ//(p.289)
GS39kamasutu:1676_0: 5.5.12 /.tatra ca^apānaka^ante nagara^striyo yathā^paricayam antaḥpurikāṇāṃ pṛthak pṛthag bhoga^avāsakān praviśya kathābhir
GS39kamasutu:1677: 5.5.13/.tatra praṇihitā rāja^dāsī prayojyāyāḥ pūrva^saṃsṛṣṭā tāṃ tatra (p.290) saṃbhāṣeta/
GS39kamasutu:1679: 5.5.15/.prāg eva svabhavanasthāṃ brūyāt/ amuṣyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ tava
GS39kamasutu:1680: rāja^bhavana^sthānāni rāmanīyakāni darśayiṣyāmi^iti kāle ca yojayet/ bahiḥ
GS39kamasutu:1683: gūḍha^bhitti^saṃcārāṃś citra^karmāṇi krīḍā^mṛgān yantrāṇi śakunān vyāghra^siṃha^pañjara^ādīni ca yāni purastād varṇitāni syuḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1687: 5.5.20/.apratipadyamānāṃ svayam eva^īśvara āgatya^upacāraiḥ sānvitāṃ rañjayitvā saṃbhūya ca sa^anurāgaṃ visṛjet/
GS39kamasutu:1688: 5.5.21/.prayojyāyāś ca patyur anugraha^ucitasya dārān nityam antaḥpuram
GS39kamasutu:1689: aucityāt praveśayet/ tatra praṇihitā (p.291) rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1691: 5.5.22/.antaḥpurikā vā prayojyayā saha svaceṭikā saṃpreṣaṇena prītiṃ
GS39kamasutu:1692: kuryāt/ prasṛta^prītiṃ ca sa^apadeśaṃ darśane niyojayet/ praviṣṭāṃ pūjitāṃ pīta^vartīm praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa/
GS39kamasutu:1693: 5.5.23/.yasmin vā vijñāne prayojyā vikhyātā syāt tad darśana^artham
GS39kamasutu:1694: antaḥpurikā sa^upacāraṃ tām āhvayet/ praviṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti
GS39kamasutu:1696_0: 5.5.24 /.udbhūtān arthasya bhītasya vā bhāryāṃ bhikṣukī brūyāt asāv antaḥpurikā rājani siddhā gṛhīta^vākyā mama vacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
GS39kamasutu:1696_1: svabhāvataś ca kṛpā^śīlā tām anena^upāyena^adhigamiṣyāmi / aham eva te praveśaṃ
GS39kamasutu:1697: kārayiṣyāmi/ sā ca te bhartur mahā^antam anarthaṃ nivartayiṣyati^iti
GS39kamasutu:1698: pratipannāṃ dvis trir iti praveśayet/ antaḥpurikā ca^asyā abhayaṃ dadyāt/
GS39kamasutu:1700: ca saṃprahṛṣṭāṃ praṇihitā rāja^dāsī^iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa/
GS39kamasutu:1701: 5.5.25/.etayā vṛtty^arthināṃ mahāmātra^abhitaptānāṃ balād vigṛhītānāṃ vyavahāre durbalānāṃ sva^bhogena^asaṃtuṣṭānāṃ rājani prīti^kāmānāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1702: rājya^janeṣu paṅkti(vyakti)m icchatāṃ sajātair bādhyamānānāṃ sajātān bādhitukāmānāṃ sūcakānām anyeṣāṃ kārya^vaśināṃ jāyā vyākhyātāḥ//(p.292)
GS39kamasutu:1703: 5.5.26/.anyena vā prayojyāṃ saha saṃsṛṣṭāṃ saṃgrāhya dāsyam upanītāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1705: 5.5.27/.praṇidhinā ca^āyatim asyāḥ saṃdūṣya rājani vidviṣṭa iti kalatra^avagraha^upāyena^enām antaḥpuraṃ praveśayed iti pracchanna^yogāḥ/
GS39kamasutu:1712: praviśanty antaḥpuram upabhuktā eva visṛjyanta ity āndhrāṇām/
GS39kamasutu:1713: 5.5.32/.mahāmātra^iṣvarāṇām antaḥpurāṇi niśi sevā^arthaṃ rājānam upagacchanti vātsagulmakānām/
GS39kamasutu:1718: 5.5.35/.rāja^krīḍā^arthaṃ (p.294) nagara^striyo janapada^striyaś ca saṅghaśa ekaśaś ca rāja^kulaṃ praviśanti saurāṣṭrakāṇām iti//(p.295)
GS39kamasutu:1722: 5.5.37ab/.na tv eva^etān prayuñjīta rājā lokahite rataḥ/(p.295)
GS39kamasutu:1725: 5.6.1/.na^antaḥpurāṇāṃ rakṣaṇa^yogāt puruṣa^saṃdarśanaṃ vidyate patyuś ca^ekatvād aneka^sādhāraṇatvāc ca^atṛptiḥ/ tasmāt tāni prayogata eva parasparaṃ rañjayeyuḥ//(p.296)
GS39kamasutu:1729_0: 5.6.4 /.rājānaś ca kṛpā^śīlā vinā^api bhāva^yogād āyojita^apadravyā yāvad artham ekayā rātryā bahvībhir api gacchanti / yasyāṃ
GS39kamasutu:1729_1: tu prītir vāsaka ṛtuv vā tatra^abhiprāyataḥ pravartanta iti prācya^upacārāḥ //(p.297)
GS39kamasutu:1730: 5.6.5/.strī^yogeṇa^eva puruṣāṇām apy alabdha^vṛttīnāṃ viyoniṣu vijātiṣu strī^pratimāsu kevala^upamardanāc ca^abhiprāya^nivṛttir vyākhyātā//(p.297)
GS39kamasutu:1731: 5.6.6/.yoṣav eṣāṃś ca nāgarakān prayeṇa antaḥpurikāḥ paricārikābhiḥ saha
GS39kamasutu:1733: 5.6.7/.teṣām upāvartane dhātreyikāś ca abhyantara^saṃsṛṣṭā āyatiṃ darśayantyaḥ prayateran/
GS39kamasutu:1737: 5.6.10/.nāgārakas tu suprāpam apy antaḥpuram apāya^bhūyiṣṭhatvān na praviśed iti vātsyāyanaḥ//(p.298)
GS39kamasutu:1739: alpa^pramatta^rakṣakaṃ proṣitā^rājakaṃ kāraṇāni samīkṣya bahuśa āhūyamāno
GS39kamasutu:1740: +artha^buddhyā kakṣyā^praveśaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tābhir eva vihita^upāyaḥ
GS39kamasutu:1743: 5.6.13/.bahiś ca rakṣibhir anyad eva kāraṇam apadiśya saṃsṛjyeta/
GS39kamasutu:1744: 5.6.14/.antaś^cāriṇyāṃ ca paricārikāyāṃ vidita^arthāyāṃ saktam ātmānaṃ rūpayet/ tad alābhāc ca śokam antaḥpraveśinībhiś ca dūtī^kalpaṃ sakalam
GS39kamasutu:1747: 5.6.16/.dūtyās tv asaṃcāre yatra gṛhīta^ākārāyāḥ prayojyāyā darśana^yogas
GS39kamasutu:1751: 5.6.19/.yatra saṃpāto +asyās tatra citra^karmaṇas tad yuktasya vyarthānāṃ
